message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The symptoms suggest that the patient is experiencing manic episodes, which is associated with bipolar disorder. Among the options, only genetic predisposition is strongly associated with bipolar disorder. Maternal obstetric complications and advanced paternal age may have some role in the development of mental illness but they are not specific to bipolar disorder. Being married is not a predisposing factor for bipolar disorder.
